pkgmetadata.longdescription: Anope IRC Services provide user and channel management services for an IRC server. It is a well-known package which continues to be actively developed. It has support for multiple different IRCd linking protocols.

use.flag: Build LDAP modules for e.g. opertypes
Enables the STATS and GSTATS commands
Stores channel statistics in a mysql database
Dynamically ties users to Anope opertypes via LDAP
Add support for POSIX Compatible Regular Expressions
Allows granting users services operator privileges from SQL
